string.text: The order is finished. Please collect your %s.
Do you have anything to trade?
I'm here to pick up an order.
Funny you should ask. I have contact with someone who can get their hands on some special gear. Are you interested?

I have some unique items. Rare models, prototypes, unique shooters - stuff like that. Plus elite equipment, the latest modifications of protective and combat suits. I check every item personally, so quality is guaranteed.
I'm not interested at the moment.
Goodbye.
I want to place an order for the %s.
I don't have the money on me.
Well, please come back when you've got the cash.
You know, I've changed my mind.
You know, I've decided to cancel my order.
That's fine but you understand your deposit is forfeit? I'll also tell everyone what a lousy customer you are, it'll probably hurt your reputation.
Yes, cancel the order.
Done.
I'll keep the order.
Fine.
Fine. If you finally decide to make an order, I'm always here.
Okay, here you go.
I'll get in touch with you as soon as the %s order is ready.
You've already made an order. The %s will be ready soon.
Great. I'll be back later.
How long till my order's ready?
It depends on how complex it is. It usually takes me from half a day to a full day.
Okay.
So you finally decided to collect your order for the %s.
Yes, here is your money.
No, Cancel the order.
Excuse me, I need to think about this.
Don't sweat it, come back when you are ready.
Okay, here you go.
There you go. Nice doing business with you. Make sure to stop by some other time, I may have more to offer.
Well, I don't have that much on me.
Okay, I'll hold the order for you. I hope you find the money soon.
You'll lose your deposit are you sure?
Still, I will not be collecting this order.
All right, suit yourself.
I'll think about it.
Sure, that's up to you. I'll hold on to the order.
The %s order is ready. That'll be %s RU.
Your order is ready. Come pick it up.
Of course. It'll be %s RU, of which I will require an advance payment of %s RU.
Pistol
Close-range weapon
Assault weapon
Sniper weapon
Armored outfit
Scientific outfit
Exoskeleton
Armored military outfit
